issue.title: [C++] Cast to duration from types other than int64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17044](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17044). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From R:

```Java

> Scalar$create(1L)$cast(duration())
Error: NotImplemented: Unsupported cast from int32 to duration using function cast_duration
```

But `Scalar$create(1L)$cast(int64())$cast(duration())` works.
